position_sizing.description: Risk 30% of equity per trade, max 5 positions (150% total exposure)

thresholds.description: Dynamic rolling thresholds: top 18% for longs, bottom 18% for shorts (selective but active)

conviction_sizing.description: Size positions based on percentile rank with reasonable cutoffs

stops.description: 3.75× ATR stop loss (between moderate and aggressive), exit after 10 days

profit_targets.description: Take profit at 2.25R - balanced between growth and risk control

exit_order.description: ATR stop → Profit target → Time stop

ml_model.description: Gradient boosting regression predicting 10-day forward returns

expected_performance.description: Estimated based on interpolation between moderate and balanced models

risk_characteristics.description: Growth-oriented approach for experienced traders comfortable with higher volatility

design_rationale.purpose: Provide strong growth potential (50-70% annual) while maintaining reasonable risk control
design_rationale.target_traders: Growth-focused traders seeking high returns with managed drawdowns (under -15%)
key_differences: 3× position size vs conservative (30% vs 10% R)
75% position size vs balanced (30% vs 40% R)
Slightly more selective than balanced (82nd/18th vs 80th/20th percentile)
Profit target between moderate and balanced (2.25R vs 2.0R/2.5R)
Stop loss between moderate and balanced (3.75× vs 3.5×/4.0× ATR)
